channel.title: iot on Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in iot on Hugo

item.title: Node Red
item.description: Official Website Playlist a visual editor to build workflow and ui application to interact with IoT wire the IoTs and user (with web dashboard) read data from IoT write data to IoT (control it, on and off etc) build a flow among IoTs and users for automation build dashboard UI all can be done by drag and drop can be used with blockchain in the supply chain… node red pulls the data from sensors and submits to blockchain automatically
